lyrics_abstract:
Oh my my my 
I'm feeling high
My money’s gone 
I'm all alone
Too much "we’ll see" 
The world keeps turnin'
Oh what a day
What a day 
What a day

Peace and blessings manifest
With every lesson learned
If your knowledge were your wealth
Then it would be well-earned

If we were made in his image
Then call us by ou[...]
